wikitext.*:
The '''Feast of Felling''' is possibly a type of event or activity in [[Minas Tirith]] or [[Gondor]] as a whole.

The term is mentioned by [[Borlas]] in his conversation with [[Saelon]] as an example of a place not to leave axes hanging from the walls in order to be able to constantly hew the [[Dark Tree]], a description of the growing threat of evil in [[Middle-earth]].<ref>{{PM|XVI}}</ref>

== See also ==
* [[Turuhalmë]], a feast within [[The Book of Lost Tales]] that was related to logging.
